thread.title: Liverpool transfer news and rumours: Reds join race for Inter midfielder Ivan Perisic?
thread.title_full: Liverpool transfer news and rumours: Reds join race for Inter midfielder Ivan Perisic?

author: James Whaling
title: Liverpool transfer news and rumours: Reds join race for Inter midfielder Ivan Perisic?
text:
Perisic is on Liverpool's radar (Photo: AFP) Share Get Liverpool     
Liverpool have joined the race for Inter Milan midfielder Ivan Perisic. 
That is according to Italian outlet Gazzetta dello Sport, who say the Croatian is on the Reds' radar, as well as Premier League rivals Manchester United and Chelsea. 
The Â£30million-rated playmaker, 27, has caught the eye with a string of eye-catching performances for the San Siro side. 
Perisic has started 15 times in Serie A this term with a further four substitute appearances, scoring seven goals. Klopp lost for words after Swansea defeat Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
